name: ToVer Defense
description:
It's one of a kind Virtual Reality Tower Defense game!
If you fancy going to a fantastic world and defend your castle, you definitely should give us a shot!
It's a game where you become a wizard and must protect your castle at all costs with such resources as enchanted towers, powerful spells and sure-fire crossbow!
Each tower represents one of three elements: Ice, Fire and Electric, also the spells are element-themed.
